# This file is a part of gr-digiham

#

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND digiham_sources
    fsk_demodulator_impl.cc
    gfsk_demodulator_impl.cc
    dc_block_impl.cc
    rrc_filter_impl.cc
    digitalvoice_filter_impl.cc
    dmr_decoder_impl.cc
    dstar_decoder_impl.cc
    nxdn_decoder_impl.cc
    pocsag_decoder_impl.cc
    ysf_decoder_impl.cc
)
message(STATUS "MBE_SYNTHESIZER=${MBE_SYNTHESIZER}")
if(MBE_SYNTHESIZER STREQUAL codecserver OR MBE_SYNTHESIZER STREQUAL mbelib)
    list(APPEND digiham_sources mbe_synthesizer_${MBE_SYNTHESIZER}_impl.cc)
endif(MBE_SYNTHESIZER STREQUAL codecserver OR MBE_SYNTHESIZER STREQUAL mbelib)

set(digiham_sources "${digiham_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT digiham_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT digiham_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-digiham SHARED ${digiham_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-digiham
    gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime
    Csdr::csdr++
    Digiham::digiham
  )
if(MBE_SYNTHESIZER STREQUAL mbelib)
    target_link_libraries(gnuradio-digiham ${LIBMBE_LIBRARY})
endif(MBE_SYNTHESIZER STREQUAL mbelib)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-digiham
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-digiham PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_digiham_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-digiham PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-digiham)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_digiham_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-digiham)

if(NOT test_digiham_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_digiham_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_digiham_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("digiham_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
